movies.title: Ace Ventura
movies.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

movies.title: The Mask
movies.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

movies.title: Liar Liar
movies.description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
movies.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

movies.title: Justice League
movies.description: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

movies.title: Aquaman
movies.description: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.
